message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
I rejected your offer as it wasn't fair. Let's split it evenly this time.
I'll give you a bit more, but I still think I deserve more
I'm willing to compromise, but the split needs to be more reasonable. This offer is fair considering the inflation.
I'll meet you halfway between my last offer and yours
Time is running out Alice, and the deal is getting worse for you every round. I'm willing to be generous, but this is my final offer.
